tool_description: Reorganizes existing queue order based on changing priorities, new information, or optimization rules to improve overall efficiency.

current_queue.description: Current queue of request IDs in order

updated_priorities.description: Updated priority scores corresponding to current_queue

reorganization_trigger.description: Reason for reorganization (priority_change, sla_risk, agent_availability, manual)

affected_requests.description: Specific request IDs that triggered reorganization

max_position_change.description: Maximum positions a request can move to minimize disruption

error_messages: Array length mismatch: current_queue and updated_priorities must have same length.
Invalid reorganization_trigger: Must be one of [priority_change, sla_risk, agent_availability, manual].
Invalid max_position_change: Must be a positive integer.
Empty queue: current_queue cannot be empty.
usage: Provide current_queue, updated_priorities, and reorganization_trigger; optionally specify affected_requests and max_position_change. Returns optimized queue order.

positions_changed.description: Number of requests that changed position

affected_customers.description: Customer IDs whose wait times were significantly affected
